epic.title: Clothing Store Build
epic.summary: Deliver a basic online clothing store with catalog, cart, PayPal checkout, COD option and admin operations.

stories.title: Create responsive header
stories.description: Create responsive header with brand and main navigation.
acceptance_criteria: Header contains brand name and navigation links
Header behaves responsively on mobile and desktop
Navigation links match site routes

stories.title: Implement footer
stories.description: Implement footer with copyright text and about link.
acceptance_criteria: Footer displays copyright text
About link navigates to About Us page
Footer layout matches design at all breakpoints

stories.title: Add quick links
stories.description: Add quick links module for Clothing, Order Us, Contact Us and Track.
acceptance_criteria: Quick links present and clickable
Links reflect current active page state
Accessible (keyboard and screen reader) links
stories.raw_text_reference: Clothing Order Us Contact Us About Us Track

features.title: Product Catalog
features.description: Clothing page UI: product cards, details and filtering.

stories.title: Build product card
stories.description: Implement product card component with image and short description.
acceptance_criteria: Each card shows image, title and short description
Cards align into responsive grid
Image alt text present for accessibility
stories.raw_text_reference: This page consists of product details.

stories.title: Add order button
stories.description: Add 'Order this Product' action on product card to start checkout.
acceptance_criteria: Button navigates to order flow with selected product prefilled
Button disabled when out of stock
Action tracked in analytics

stories.title: Show price and id
stories.description: Expose cost, category and Product ID on product card for quick reference.
acceptance_criteria: Each card displays price and category label
Product ID visible in admin view or modal
Formatting of price consistent site-wide

features.title: Cart and Review
features.description: Cart building and order review prior to checkout.

stories.title: Aggregate cart totals
stories.description: Aggregate cart and display total quantity and amount.
acceptance_criteria: Cart displays total quantity and grand total
Totals include taxes and delivery charges
Cart persisted for authenticated users

stories.title: Enable item updates
stories.description: Enable item removal and quantity update in cart UI.
acceptance_criteria: Users can increment/decrement quantities
Removing item updates totals immediately
Undo option available for removal
stories.raw_text_reference: it should be convenient for the customer to view the contents of their cart and to be able to remove or add items to their cart

stories.title: Show confirmation page
stories.description: Show order confirmation page listing line items and grand total before payment.
acceptance_criteria: Order confirmation shows each item, qty and price
Grand total displays taxes/delivery if applied
Confirm button proceeds to payment selection
stories.raw_text_reference: Once users order item they are able to see ordered products and grand total.

features.title: Payment Integration
features.description: PayPal instant payment and fallback COD option with confirmation pages.

stories.title: Integrate PayPal
stories.description: Integrate PayPal checkout and redirect users to PayPal with order summary.
acceptance_criteria: User redirected to PayPal with itemized order details
PayPal returns user to success or failure URL
Order status updated upon PayPal confirmation
stories.raw_text_reference: redirected to PayPal payment page for Instant Pay

stories.title: Add payment pages
stories.description: Implement success and failed payment pages with clear messaging.
acceptance_criteria: Success page shows order ID and confirmation message
Failed page shows retry instructions
Both pages accessible only post-payment callback

stories.title: Support COD
stories.description: Support Cash on Delivery by recording unpaid orders for admin processing.
acceptance_criteria: COD orders saved with payment status 'pending'
Admin dashboard shows COD open/closed grouping
User sees COD order confirmation with next steps

features.title: Admin Console
features.description: Admin features for product/user/order management and shipping updates.

stories.title: Admin product editor
stories.description: Create admin product editor matching Shopping table fields.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can set ID, Product name, Product ID, Cost, Category, Image, Description
Changes persist to DB and appear in public catalog
Validation prevents invalid price formats
stories.raw_text_reference: Shopping: ID, Product, Product ID, Cost, Category, Image, Description

stories.title: Orders list view
stories.description: Build orders list view with filters for COD Open/Closed states.
acceptance_criteria: Orders list filters by payment type and open/closed states
Selecting an order shows details and shipping actions
Orders sorted by date by default
stories.raw_text_reference: COD | Open Orders COD | Closed Orders

stories.title: Mark shipped action
stories.description: Add 'mark shipped' action which sets OrderShipped and emails the customer.
acceptance_criteria: Marking shipped sets OrderShipped and records ship date
Customer receives shipment confirmation email
Action recorded in audit log
stories.raw_text_reference: Admin can ship order to user based on order placed by sending confirmation mail.
